function.name: fdf_set_javascript_action
function.description: Sets the javascript action for a field.

function.name: fdf_set_value
function.description: Sets the value of a field.

function.name: fdf_set_ap
function.description: Sets the appearence of a field.

function.name: fdf_open
function.description: Opens a new FDF document.

function.name: fdf_add_template
function.description: Adds a template into the FDF document.

function.name: fdf_close
function.description: Closes the FDF document.

function.name: fdf_get_file
function.description: Gets the value of /F key.

function.name: fdf_next_field_name
function.description: Gets the name of the next field name or the first field name.

function.name: fdf_set_encoding
function.description: Sets FDF encoding (either "Shift-JIS" or "Unicode").

function.name: fdf_get_status
function.description: Gets the value of /Status key.

function.name: fdf_create
function.description: Creates a new FDF document.

function.name: fdf_save
function.description: Writes out the FDF file.

function.name: fdf_set_submit_form_action
function.description: Sets the submit form action for a field.

function.name: fdf_get_value
function.description: Gets the value of a field as string.

function.name: fdf_set_file
function.description: Sets the value of /F key.

function.name: fdf_set_flags
function.description: Sets flags for a field in the FDF document.

function.name: fdf_set_status
function.description: Sets the value of /Status key.

function.name: fdf_set_opt
function.description: Sets a value in the opt array for a field.

function.name: fdf_enum_values
function.description: Call a user defined function for each document value.

function.name: fdf_errno
function.description: Return error code for last fdf operation.

function.name: fdf_error
function.description: Return error description for fdf error code.

function.name: fdf_get_ap
function.description: Get the appearance of a field.

function.name: fdf_get_attachment
function.description: Extracts uploaded file embedded in the FDF.

function.name: fdf_get_encoding
function.description: Get the value of the /Encoding key.

function.name: fdf_get_flags
function.description: Gets the flags of a field.

function.name: fdf_get_opt
function.description: Gets a value from the opt array of a field.

function.name: fdf_get_version
function.description: Gets version number for FDF API or file.

function.name: fdf_header
function.description: Sets FDF-specific output headers.

function.name: fdf_open_string
function.description: Read a FDF document from a string.

function.name: fdf_remove_item
function.description: Sets target frame for form.

function.name: fdf_save_string
function.description: Returns the FDF document as a string.

function.name: fdf_set_on_import_javascript
function.description: Adds javascript code to be executed when Acrobat opens the FDF.

function.name: fdf_set_target_frame
function.description: Set target frame for form display.

function.name: fdf_set_version
function.description: Sets version number for a FDF file.

function.name: fdf_add_doc_javascript
function.description: Adds javascript code to the FDF document.
